title: Call Of Duty Online
description:
"Call of Duty Online will showcase the traditional features and play-modes of Call of DutyÃ‚Â® with localized, unique content tailored to the needs and interest of gamers in China."
Ã¢â‚¬â€ Activision

Call of Duty Online (also known as CODOL) is a Call of Duty game released exclusively in China as a "free-to-play micro transaction game" published, marketed, and distributed by Tencent Holdings and fully developed by Activison Shanghai and Raven Software. The game entered open beta on January 14th, 2013. The game features a new gaming model which gives the player the ability to personalize weapons, characters and equipment "with localized, unique content tailored to the needs and interest of gamers in China.". The game also reuses dozens of maps, character models and weapons from both the Modern Warfare and Black Ops series, which can be seen on its trailers.

The game features a campaign mode in which the player controls Rook and has returning characters such as Price, Soap and Ghost. There is also a robot Zombies mode in Call of Duty Online.

HOW TO INSTALL:
This is Call Of Duty Online. Yes everything is in Chinese but if you know you're way around installing files you should be fine. This is in Chinese but still playable. You need an account at http://zc.qq.com/en/index.html?from=pt. Open the exe for the game. There should be two boxes which you put in your email and password. At the bottom right there should be two buttons, click the one with an arrow next to it. And you are downloading it. Open the patch then the update. The game starts with low texture (3gb) but overtime download high-res textures (6gb).
